description: {"blocks":[{"key":"33ulp","text":"These protocols have been adapted from Ceres \"Nanotrap® Wastewater Protocol using MagMAX Kits\" (APP-030, Revision 0, Nov 2021). ","type":"align-left","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"67l4v","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5kjgh","text":"This protocol uses Nanotrap® Magnetic Virus Particles and Nanotrap® Enhancement Reagent 1 (ER1) to capture and concentrate viruses in wastewater samples. It is optimized for viral capture from 10 mL samples of wastewater and is compatible with three nucleic acid extraction kits from ThermoFisher. This protocol has been used and adapted for SARS-CoV-2 viral capture at Emory University for wastewater surveillance of COVID-19.","type":"align-left","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
keywords: Nanotrap, KingFisher, Ceres, nano, magnetic virus particles, magnetic, automated, wastewater, SARS-CoV-2, COVID-19

If using","type":"unordered-list-item"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[{"length":25,"offset":31,"style":"italic"}],"key":"77i8a","text":"a Kingfisher™ Apex System, run KF-003-WW-Nanotrap-24.kfx.","type":"unstyled"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"eobf2","text":"Follow the on-screen instructions loading the previously prepared plates at the","type":"unordered-list-item"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"dmp9f","text":"appropriate time.","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"85pq6","text":"Once the protocol is completed, the KingFisher™ plate to which lysis solution was added will contain   of lysate that is ready to be run on the MagMAX KF extraction procedure.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":101,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"9jjah","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"","data":{"amount":"500","error":false,"guid":"9893C9D0586B11EC8F9883F77ED86015","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"9iqb8","text":"Prepare the Elution Plate by aliquoting   of MagMAX Elution buffer to a new KingFisher™ 96 - 200 µL plate matching the number and location of the “Sample Plate” wells.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":40,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"79c1o","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"","data":{"amount":"60","error":false,"guid":"EE453EB058F511ECB0844B9047CF5A83","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"8u58u","text":"To prepare the Binding Plate, obtain a new KingFisher™ 96 Deep Well Plate.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":28,"length":2}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"a0tlj","text":"Aliquot   of MagMAX Proteinase K to each well in the Binding Plate in which lysate will be added.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":8,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"fj7ku","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"","data":{"amount":"10","error":false,"guid":"FE45BE4058F811ECB0844B9047CF5A83","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"9hj7c","text":"Aliquot   of the lysate from each well of the lysis plate used in Part 1 of the protocol into the Binding Plate.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":8,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"fg8f6","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"51al8","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"28vbb","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"","data":{"amount":"400","error":false,"guid":"05964D4058F911ECB0844B9047CF5A83","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}},"1":{"type":"notes","mutability":"","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"7vi04","text":"Keep track of which well contains which sample in this new bead binding plate. There should be about 100 μL of lysate remaining in each well of the lysis plate which can be discarded.","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"3fco7","text":"Aliquot   of MagMAX Binding Solution into each deep well which lysate was added in the Binding Plate.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":8,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"2h0o4","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"","data":{"amount":"530","error":false,"guid":"13311ED058F911ECB0844B9047CF5A83","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}}}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"11nvm","text":"Vortex and thoroughly mix the MagMAX DNA/RNA Binding Beads. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"4u88c","text":"Prepare Wash Plate 2 by aliquoting   of 80% EtOH to a new KingFisher™ 96 Deep Well Plate matching the number and location of the KingFisher™ 96 Deep Well Plate-Sample Plate wells.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":35,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"2anf1","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"","data":{"amount":"1","error":false,"guid":"E4BDFCC058F911ECB0844B9047CF5A83","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}}}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"avhfa","text":"Insert the KingFisher™ 96 Deep Well Comb into the Binding Plate.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"4uenp","text":"Aliquot   of vortexed binding beads to each well in which lysate was added in the Binding Plate.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":8,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"ep7p6","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"cdmef","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"dter2","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"","data":{"amount":"20","error":false,"guid":"7BB4CBF058F911ECB0844B9047CF5A83","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}},"1":{"type":"notes","mutability":"","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"4h9ad","text":"The total final volume should be 960 µL in each sample-containing well of this plate.  If volume exceeds 1000 µL, the possibility of contamination via spillage into adjacent wells can occur.","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"e84p","text":"Run MagMAX KingFisher™ Protocol","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8hp9u","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"4ucsu","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"notes","mutability":"","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[{"length":23,"offset":40,"style":"italic"}],"key":"6qc80","text":"If using a Kingfisher™ Flex System, run KF-008-WW-MagMAX-96.bdz. If using","type":"unordered-list-item"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[{"length":23,"offset":31,"style":"italic"}],"key":"92hoo","text":"a Kingfisher™ Apex System, run KF-003-WW-MagMAX-96.kfx.","type":"unstyled"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"brf05","text":"Follow the on-screen instructions loading the previously prepared plates at the","type":"unordered-list-item"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"45ck2","text":"appropriate time.","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}
